amendment.description: To establish a program to reduce the potential impacts of solar energy facilities on certain species.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3229 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3229 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Flake to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2153) To establish a program to reduce the potential impacts of solar energy facilities on certain species.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3229 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3229 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Flake to Amendment SA 2953.
